edge-case.name: Dr. María José Gutiérrez-Sánchez von Zimmermann III
edge-case.bio: Experienced senior executive leader with over 25 years of expertise in enterprise software architecture, distributed systems design, cloud infrastructure, DevOps practices, agile methodologies, team leadership, and strategic technology planning across multiple Fortune 500 companies in various industries including finance, healthcare, telecommunications, and e-commerce platforms.
edge-case.location: São Paulo, Brazil / Remote / Traveling frequently between EMEA and APAC regions
edge-case.company: International Conglomerate of Technology Solutions and Digital Transformation Services LLC
